docs.lead_paragraph: WHY is a censor and what is a censor? In rambling around through books, the brains of politicians, uplift yogis, theatrical producers and film magnates I stumbled across words to this effect in Webster's Dictionary:
docs.abstract: De Casseres, B, sp art on film censorship as a sport
